page.title: 02RAUGHTON HEAD YOUNG FARMERS
page.content:
This club is a form of entertainment and is held on a Tuesday night in Gaitsgill Hall. Different activities take place every week. Sometimes we go on visits to various organisations, or people come to the hall to give talks and demonstrations.
The senior members of the club often organise dances and discos. Every year there is an Annual General Meeting in Bournemouth where all the clubs get together for competitions. There is also a field day with a dance at night.
We sometimes go ice_skating and ten_pin bowling. Overall it is a very friendly and enjoyable club.
